VIII.iv.4.A.9.e
.
Possible Hospitalization Adjustment Under 38 CFR 3.552(b)(2)
The A&A allowance, including that payable under
38 U.S.C. 1114(r)(2)
, is subject to possible hospitalization adjustment, or reduction, under
38 CFR 3.552(b)(2)
.
